EmailTemplate.description: SHP Web Grievance Email Notification when SR is created for Expedited
EmailTemplate.name: SHP Web Grievance Email Notification when SR is created for Expedited
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Grievance Ticket Number {!Case.CaseNumber} is created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HIGH PRIORITY:
Expedited Web Grievance service request number {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created.
The Origin of this request is '{!Case.Origin}'
Thank you!
